title: Official Blind Review #3
review:
While the general direction of this work is nice it is unfortunate that the authors did not compare to the many related approaches. 
It is unclear how the approach would be used for tree structures like wordnet and imagenet. 

Unclear novelty due to lack of comparisons to many very related approaches.
